name: Croissant
short_description: Flaky and golden, these crescent-shaped delights from France boast layers of pure butter and a subtly sweet yeast dough. Each bite offers a tender, slightly elastic interior, perfect for breakfast or a sweet treat.

name: Quiche
short_description: Originating from France, this savory pie features a golden pastry crust brimming with a rich custard of eggs and cream, complemented by savory ingredients like bacon, cheese, and fresh vegetables. Perfectly baked to golden perfection, each slice offers a delightful balance of flavors and textures.

name: Crêpes
short_description: Delicate and versatile, these thin pancakes from Brittany are a French culinary icon. Whether filled with sweet fruits or savory cheeses, crêpes delight with each flavorful bite.

name: Baguette
short_description: French baguettes boast a crispy crust and a light, airy interior, embodying the essence of Parisian bakeries. Enjoy their subtly nutty flavor, perfected through traditional fermentation techniques.

name: Macarons
short_description: Delicate meringue shells, crisp on the outside and chewy within, embrace luscious fillings like raspberry, pistachio, or chocolate. Originating in Italy, these French treats are a sweet symbol of culinary artistry.

name: Éclair
short_description: Elongated and elegantly glazed, these French pastries feature a crispy exterior enveloping a soft dough, filled with rich, sweet cream. A timeless treat that delights the senses!

name: Bisque
short_description: Originating from France, this luxurious seafood bisque captivates with its rich blend of puréed lobster, aromatic vegetables, and a splash of cognac, creating a velvety, indulgent experience.

name: Soufflé
short_description: Originating from France, this classic dessert captivates with its light, airy texture and rich flavors, often infused with chocolate or vanilla. Perfectly baked to a golden rise, it’s a must-try indulgence.

name: Foie gras
short_description: Indulge in the rich, buttery texture of French foie gras, a luxurious delicacy made from the liver of specially fed ducks or geese. Served as a pâté or seared, its savory depth captivates gourmet palates.

name: Crème brûlée
short_description: A classic French dessert, this silky custard boasts rich vanilla notes beneath a perfectly caramelized sugar crust. Each spoonful offers a delightful contrast of creamy and crunchy textures.

name: Gratin
short_description: Originating in France, au gratin dishes are beautifully baked to perfection, combining creamy layers with a golden, crispy topping. Rich flavors meld in a delightful contrast, making every bite irresistible.

name: Brioche
short_description: Originating from France, brioche delights with its rich, buttery flavor and soft, flaky texture. Perfectly golden and slightly sweet, it's a beloved pastry that elevates any breakfast or dessert.

name: Châteaubriand
short_description: Originating in France, Châteaubriand features a thick cut of beef tenderloin expertly grilled or roasted to perfection. Seasoned with olive oil, black pepper, and salt, it delivers rich, savory flavors that celebrate classic French cuisine.

name: Ratatouille
short_description: Originating from Provence, this vibrant vegetable ragout features tender zucchini, smoky eggplant, and sweet bell peppers, simmered with ripe tomatoes and fragrant herbs. A celebration of Mediterranean flavors, it's a wholesome taste of French culinary tradition.

name: Hollandaise sauce (Sauce hollandaise)
short_description: A silky emulsion of egg yolks and rich butter, Hollandaise sauce bursts with zesty lemon and a hint of white vinegar. A classic French mother sauce, it elevates dishes like eggs Benedict to gourmet heights.

name: Chocolate mousse (Mousse au chocolat)
short_description: Indulge in the airy delight of French chocolate mousse, where rich dark chocolate meets velvety butter and eggs. Celebrated for its luxurious texture and deep flavor, it's a timeless classic that enchants dessert lovers.

name: Profiteroles
short_description: Chocolate-covered puff pastries burst with creamy delights like whipped cream or vanilla ice cream. Hailing from France, these indulgent treats celebrate culinary artistry in every bite.

name: Gaufre
short_description: Delight in the warm, crisp layers of Belgian gaufres, expertly baked in a unique waffle iron. Infused with vanilla and a hint of caramel, these iconic treats are a sweet celebration of Belgian culture.

name: Pepper steak (Steak au poivre)
short_description: Coated in a fragrant crust of crushed black peppercorns, tender beef steak sizzles to perfection, crowned with a rich cognac cream sauce. A classic French bistro favorite that delights the senses.

name: Croque-monsieur
short_description: A Parisian classic, this indulgent hot sandwich layers rich Gruyère and savory wet-cured ham between buttery toasted bread, creating a melty, flavorful delight that captures the essence of French cuisine.

name: Pain perdu
short_description: Originating from France, this delightful breakfast transforms stale bread into a luscious treat, soaked in a rich mixture of eggs, milk, and sugar, then pan-fried to golden perfection. Enjoy the warm, buttery sweetness that celebrates resourceful cooking!

name: Riz au lait
short_description: Creamy and comforting, this French classic features tender rice simmered in sweetened milk infused with fragrant vanilla. A nostalgic treat that celebrates simplicity and tradition.

name: Consommé
short_description: Originating from France, this luxurious clear soup showcases a perfectly clarified beef stock infused with the sweetness of carrots, parsnips, turnips, and leeks, delivering a delicate yet rich flavor.

name: Beignets
short_description: Deep-fried squares of dough, dusted with powdered sugar, deliver a warm, fluffy bite of indulgence. Originating from France, these delightful treats embody a sweet taste of tradition.
